sourcesContent:
export const MenuData = [
  // Coffee
  {
    id: 1,
    price: 2500,
    title: "Espresso",
    desc: "Strong and rich espresso shot",
    img: require("./../../assests/menu/Coffee/coffee-1.png"),
    category: "Coffee",
    ingredients: [
      { name: "Coffee Beans", quantity: 15, unit: "g" }, // 15 grams of coffee beans
      { name: "Mineral Water", quantity: 50, unit: "ml" }, // 50 ml of water
    ],
  },
  {
    id: 2,
    price: 2000,
    title: "Filter Coffee",
    desc: "Freshly brewed filter coffee",
    img: require("./../../assests/menu/Coffee/coffee-2.png"),
    category: "Coffee",
    ingredients: [
      { name: "Coffee Beans", quantity: 20, unit: "g" },
      { name: "Mineral Water", quantity: 200, unit: "ml" },
    ],
  },
  {
    id: 3,
    price: 2500,
    title: "Americano",
    desc: "Espresso with hot water",
    img: require("./../../assests/menu/Coffee/coffee-3.png"),
    category: "Coffee",
    ingredients: [
      { name: "Coffee Beans", quantity: 15, unit: "g" },
      { name: "Mineral Water", quantity: 100, unit: "ml" },
    ],
  },
  {
    id: 4,
    price: 3000,
    title: "Turkish Coffee",
    desc: "Traditional Turkish coffee",
    img: require("./../../assests/menu/Coffee/coffee-4.png"),
    category: "Coffee",
    ingredients: [
      { name: "Coffee Beans", quantity: 18, unit: "g" },
      { name: "Mineral Water", quantity: 60, unit: "ml" },
      { name: "Sugar", quantity: 10, unit: "g" }, // Optional sugar for Turkish coffee
    ],
  },
  {
    id: 5,
    price: 3500,
    title: "Café au Lait",
    desc: "Coffee with steamed milk",
    img: require("./../../assests/menu/Coffee/coffee-5.png"),
    category: "Coffee",
    ingredients: [
      { name: "Coffee Beans", quantity: 15, unit: "g" },
      { name: "Milk", quantity: 150, unit: "ml" },
    ],
  },
  {
    id: 6,
    price: 3000,
    title: "Cappuccino",
    desc: "Espresso with milk foam",
    img: require("./../../assests/menu/Coffee/coffee-6.png"),
    category: "Coffee",
    ingredients: [
      { name: "Coffee Beans", quantity: 15, unit: "g" },
      { name: "Milk", quantity: 100, unit: "ml" },
      { name: "Whipped Cream", quantity: 30, unit: "g" }, // Optional whipped cream
    ],
  },
  {
    id: 7,
    price: 3500,
    title: "Caramel Coffee",
    desc: "Coffee with caramel flavor",
    img: require("./../../assests/menu/Coffee/coffee-7.png"),
    category: "Coffee",
    ingredients: [
      { name: "Coffee Beans", quantity: 15, unit: "g" },
      { name: "Milk", quantity: 100, unit: "ml" },
      { name: "Caramel Syrup", quantity: 10, unit: "ml" }, // Caramel syrup
    ],
  },
  {
    id: 8,
    price: 3500,
    title: "Hazelnut Coffee",
    desc: "Coffee with hazelnut flavor",
    img: require("./../../assests/menu/Coffee/coffee-8.png"),
    category: "Coffee",
    ingredients: [
      { name: "Coffee Beans", quantity: 15, unit: "g" },
      { name: "Milk", quantity: 100, unit: "ml" },
      { name: "Mint Syrup", quantity: 10, unit: "ml" }, // Hazelnut syrup (Note: Mint Syrup is used here, but it should be Hazelnut Syrup if available)
    ],
  },
  {
    id: 9,
    price: 3500,
    title: "Chocolate Coffee",
    desc: "Coffee with chocolate flavor",
    img: require("./../../assests/menu/Coffee/coffee-9.png"),
    category: "Coffee",
    ingredients: [
      { name: "Coffee Beans", quantity: 15, unit: "g" },
      { name: "Milk", quantity: 100, unit: "ml" },
      { name: "Chocolate Powder", quantity: 10, unit: "g" }, // Cocoa powder
    ],
  },
  {
    id: 10,
    price: 3000,
    title: "Iced Coffee",
    desc: "Cold and refreshing coffee",
    img: require("./../../assests/menu/Coffee/coffee-10.png"),
    category: "Coffee",
    ingredients: [
      { name: "Coffee Beans", quantity: 15, unit: "g" },
      { name: "Mineral Water", quantity: 100, unit: "ml" },
      { name: "Sugar", quantity: 10, unit: "g" },
    ],
  },
  // Tea
    // Teas
    {
      id: 11,
      price: 2500,
      title: "Green Tea",
      desc: "Healthy and refreshing green tea",
      img: require("./../../assests/menu/Tea/tea-1.png"),
      category: "Tea",
      ingredients: [
        { name: "Green Tea", quantity: 5, unit: "g" }, // 5 grams of green tea leaves
        { name: "Mineral Water", quantity: 200, unit: "ml" }, // 200 ml of water
      ],
    },
    {
      id: 12,
      price: 3000,
      title: "Mint Tea",
      desc: "Fresh mint-infused tea",
      img: require("./../../assests/menu/Tea/tea-2.png"),
      category: "Tea",
      ingredients: [
        { name: "Black Tea", quantity: 5, unit: "g" }, // 5 grams of black tea leaves
        { name: "Mint Syrup", quantity: 10, unit: "ml" }, // 10 ml of mint syrup
        { name: "Mineral Water", quantity: 200, unit: "ml" }, // 200 ml of water
      ],
    },
    {
      id: 13,
      price: 3000,
      title: "Almond Tea",
      desc: "Tea infused with almond flavor",
      img: require("./../../assests/menu/Tea/tea-3.png"),
      category: "Tea",
      ingredients: [
        { name: "Black Tea", quantity: 5, unit: "g" }, // 5 grams of black tea leaves
        { name: "Almonds", quantity: 10, unit: "g" }, // 10 grams of almonds
        { name: "Mineral Water", quantity: 200, unit: "ml" }, // 200 ml of water
      ],
    },
    {
      id: 14,
      price: 3500,
      title: "Pine Nut Tea",
      desc: "Tea topped with pine nuts",
      img: require("./../../assests/menu/Tea/tea-4.png"),
      category: "Tea",
      ingredients: [
        { name: "Black Tea", quantity: 5, unit: "g" }, // 5 grams of black tea leaves
        { name: "Pine Nuts", quantity: 15, unit: "g" }, // 15 grams of pine nuts
        { name: "Mineral Water", quantity: 200, unit: "ml" }, // 200 ml of water
      ],
    },
    {
      id: 15,
      price: 5000,
      title: "Baklava Tea",
      desc: "Sweet tea inspired by baklava flavors",
      img: require("./../../assests/menu/Tea/tea-5.png"),
      category: "Tea",
      ingredients: [
        { name: "Black Tea", quantity: 5, unit: "g" }, // 5 grams of black tea leaves
        { name: "Honey", quantity: 15, unit: "ml" }, // 15 ml of honey
        { name: "Mineral Water", quantity: 200, unit: "ml" }, // 200 ml of water
      ],
    },
  
    // Juices & Cocktails
    {
      id: 16,
      price: 3500,
      title: "Lemonade",
      desc: "Fresh and zesty homemade lemonade",
      img: require("./../../assests/menu/Juices/juice-1.jpg"),
      category: "Juices & Cocktails",
      ingredients: [
        { name: "Lime", quantity: 2, unit: "pcs" }, // 2 limes
        { name: "Sugar", quantity: 20, unit: "g" }, // 20 grams of sugar
        { name: "Mineral Water", quantity: 300, unit: "ml" }, // 300 ml of water
      ],
    },
    {
      id: 17,
      price: 5000,
      title: "Strawberry Juice",
      desc: "Sweet and refreshing strawberry juice",
      img: require("./../../assests/menu/Juices/juice-2.jpg"),
      category: "Juices & Cocktails",
      ingredients: [
        { name: "Strawberries", quantity: 100, unit: "g" }, // 100 grams of strawberries
        { name: "Sugar", quantity: 15, unit: "g" }, // 15 grams of sugar
        { name: "Mineral Water", quantity: 200, unit: "ml" }, // 200 ml of water
      ],
    },
    {
      id: 18,
      price: 4500,
      title: "Orange Juice",
      desc: "Freshly squeezed orange juice",
      img: require("./../../assests/menu/Juices/juice-3.jpg"),
      category: "Juices & Cocktails",
      ingredients: [
        { name: "Oranges", quantity: 3, unit: "pcs" }, // 3 oranges
      ],
    },
    {
      id: 19,
      price: 5000,
      title: "Banana Juice",
      desc: "Smooth and creamy banana juice",
      img: require("./../../assests/menu/Juices/juice-4.jpg"),
      category: "Juices & Cocktails",
      ingredients: [
        { name: "Bananas", quantity: 2, unit: "pcs" }, // 2 bananas
        { name: "Milk", quantity: 200, unit: "ml" }, // 200 ml of milk
        { name: "Sugar", quantity: 10, unit: "g" }, // 10 grams of sugar
      ],
    },
    {
      id: 20,
      price: 6000,
      title: "Kiwi Juice",
      desc: "Tangy and refreshing kiwi juice",
      img: require("./../../assests/menu/Juices/juice-5.jpg"),
      category: "Juices & Cocktails",
      ingredients: [
        { name: "Kiwis", quantity: 3, unit: "pcs" }, // 3 kiwis
        { name: "Sugar", quantity: 15, unit: "g" }, // 15 grams of sugar
        { name: "Mineral Water", quantity: 200, unit: "ml" }, // 200 ml of water
      ],
    },
    {
      id: 21,
      price: 7000,
      title: "Cocktail Juice",
      desc: "Mixed fruit juice cocktail",
      img: require("./../../assests/menu/Juices/juice-6.jpg"),
      category: "Juices & Cocktails",
      ingredients: [
        { name: "Oranges", quantity: 1, unit: "pc" }, // 1 orange
        { name: "Strawberries", quantity: 50, unit: "g" }, // 50 grams of strawberries
        { name: "Kiwis", quantity: 1, unit: "pc" }, // 1 kiwi
        { name: "Sugar", quantity: 20, unit: "g" }, // 20 grams of sugar
        { name: "Mineral Water", quantity: 200, unit: "ml" }, // 200 ml of water
      ],
    },
    {
      id: 22,
      price: 8000,
      title: "Milkshake",
      desc: "Creamy milkshake with your choice of flavor",
      img: require("./../../assests/menu/Juices/juice-7.jpg"),
      category: "Juices & Cocktails",
      ingredients: [
        { name: "Milk", quantity: 300, unit: "ml" }, // 300 ml of milk
        { name: "Ice Cream", quantity: 2, unit: "scoops" }, // 2 scoops of ice cream
        { name: "Flavor Syrup", quantity: 20, unit: "ml" }, // 20 ml of flavor syrup (e.g., vanilla, chocolate)
      ],
    },
    {
      id: 23,
      price: 6000,
      title: "Hot Chocolate",
      desc: "Rich and comforting hot chocolate",
      img: require("./../../assests/menu/Juices/juice-8.jpg"),

      ingredients: [
        { name: "Milk", quantity: 200, unit: "ml" }, // 200 ml of milk
        { name: "Chocolate Powder", quantity: 20, unit: "g" }, // 20 grams of chocolate powder
        { name: "Sugar", quantity: 10, unit: "g" }, // 10 grams of sugar

    },
    {
      id: 24,
      price: 5000,
      title: "Eggnog",
      desc: "Classic creamy eggnog",
      img: require("./../../assests/menu/Juices/juice-9.jpg"),

      ingredients: [
        { name: "Milk", quantity: 200, unit: "ml" }, // 200 ml of milk
        { name: "Eggs", quantity: 2, unit: "pcs" }, // 2 eggs
        { name: "Sugar", quantity: 20, unit: "g" }, // 20 grams of sugar

    {
      id: 25,
      price: 7000,
      title: "Mojito",
      desc: "Refreshing mint and lime mojito",

      ingredients: [
        { name: "Lime", quantity: 1, unit: "pc" }, // 1 lime
        { name: "Mint Syrup", quantity: 15, unit: "ml" }, // 15 ml of mint syrup
        { name: "Sugar", quantity: 10, unit: "g" }, // 10 grams of sugar
        { name: "Mineral Water", quantity: 200, unit: "ml" }, // 200 ml of water
      ],
    },
  
    // Ice Cream
    {
      id: 18,
      price: 5000,
      title: "2 Scoops",
      desc: "Two scoops of ice cream",
      img: require("./../../assests/menu/Ice/icecream-1.jpg"),
      category: "Ice Cream",
      ingredients: [
        { name: "Ice Cream", quantity: 2, unit: "scoops" }, // 2 scoops of ice cream

    {
      id: 19,
      price: 6000,
      title: "3 Scoops",
      desc: "Three scoops of ice cream",
      img: require("./../../assests/menu/Ice/icecream-2.jpg"),

      ingredients: [
        { name: "Ice Cream", quantity: 3, unit: "scoops" }, // 3 scoops of ice cream

    {
      id: 20,
      price: 8000,
      title: "Special Ice Cream",

    {
      id: 26,
      price: 5000,
      title: "Cakes",
      desc: "Delicious and fluffy assorted cakes",
      img: require("./../../assests/menu/Pastries/pastries-1.jpg"),

      ingredients: [
        { name: "Flour", quantity: 100, unit: "g" }, // 100 grams of flour
        { name: "Sugar", quantity: 50, unit: "g" }, // 50 grams of sugar
        { name: "Eggs", quantity: 2, unit: "pcs" }, // 2 eggs
        { name: "Butter", quantity: 30, unit: "g" }, // 30 grams of butter

    {
      id: 27,
      price: 7000,
      title: "Fondant",
      desc: "Rich chocolate fondant with a molten center",

      ingredients: [
        { name: "Chocolate Powder", quantity: 50, unit: "g" }, // 50 grams of chocolate powder
        { name: "Flour", quantity: 30, unit: "g" }, // 30 grams of flour
        { name: "Sugar", quantity: 40, unit: "g" }, // 40 grams of sugar
        { name: "Butter", quantity: 20, unit: "g" }, // 20 grams of butter
        { name: "Eggs", quantity: 2, unit: "pcs" }, // 2 eggs

    {
      id: 28,
      price: 6500,
      title: "Chocolate Mousse",
      desc: "Smooth and creamy chocolate mousse",
      img: require("./../../assests/menu/Pastries/pastries-3.jpg"),

        { name: "Chocolate Powder", quantity: 50, unit: "g" }, // 50 grams of chocolate powder

    {
      id: 29,
      price: 7000,
      title: "Tiramisu",
      desc: "Classic Italian dessert with mascarpone and coffee",
      img: require("./../../assests/menu/Pastries/pastries-4.jpg"),
      category: "Pastries",
      ingredients: [
        { name: "Mascarpone", quantity: 100, unit: "g" }, // 100 grams of mascarpone
        { name: "Coffee Beans", quantity: 10, unit: "g" }, // 10 grams of coffee beans
        { name: "Eggs", quantity: 2, unit: "pcs" }, // 2 eggs
        { name: "Sugar", quantity: 30, unit: "g" }, // 30 grams of sugar
        { name: "Biscuits", quantity: 50, unit: "g" }, // 50 grams of biscuits
      ],
    },
    {
      id: 30,
      price: 8000,
      title: "Cheesecake",
      desc: "Creamy cheesecake with a biscuit crust",
      img: require("./../../assests/menu/Pastries/pastries-5.jpg"),
      category: "Pastries",
      ingredients: [
        { name: "Cream Cheese", quantity: 150, unit: "g" }, // 150 grams of cream cheese
        { name: "Biscuits", quantity: 50, unit: "g" }, // 50 grams of biscuits
        { name: "Sugar", quantity: 40, unit: "g" }, // 40 grams of sugar
        { name: "Butter", quantity: 30, unit: "g" }, // 30 grams of butter
        { name: "Eggs", quantity: 2, unit: "pcs" }, // 2 eggs
      ],
    },
    {
      id: 31,
      price: 2000,
      title: "Croissant",
      desc: "Flaky and buttery French croissant",
      img: require("./../../assests/menu/Pastries/pastries-6.jpg"),
      category: "Pastries",
      ingredients: [
        { name: "Flour", quantity: 100, unit: "g" }, // 100 grams of flour
        { name: "Butter", quantity: 50, unit: "g" }, // 50 grams of butter
        { name: "Yeast", quantity: 5, unit: "g" }, // 5 grams of yeast
        { name: "Sugar", quantity: 10, unit: "g" }, // 10 grams of sugar
      ],
    },
    {
      id: 32,
      price: 4000,
      title: "Classic Cake",
      desc: "Soft and moist classic cake",
      img: require("./../../assests/menu/Pastries/pastries-7.jpg"),
      category: "Pastries",
      ingredients: [
        { name: "Flour", quantity: 100, unit: "g" }, // 100 grams of flour
        { name: "Sugar", quantity: 50, unit: "g" }, // 50 grams of sugar
        { name: "Eggs", quantity: 2, unit: "pcs" }, // 2 eggs
        { name: "Butter", quantity: 30, unit: "g" }, // 30 grams of butter
      ],
    },
    {
      id: 33,
      price: 6500,
      title: "Chocolate Cake",
      desc: "Decadent chocolate cake with rich frosting",
      img: require("./../../assests/menu/Pastries/pastries-8.jpg"),
      category: "Pastries",
      ingredients: [
        { name: "Flour", quantity: 100, unit: "g" }, // 100 grams of flour
        { name: "Chocolate Powder", quantity: 50, unit: "g" }, // 50 grams of chocolate powder
        { name: "Sugar", quantity: 60, unit: "g" }, // 60 grams of sugar
        { name: "Butter", quantity: 40, unit: "g" }, // 40 grams of butter
        { name: "Eggs", quantity: 3, unit: "pcs" }, // 3 eggs
      ],
    },
    {
      id: 34,
      price: 5000,
      title: "Waffles",
      desc: "Crispy waffles served with toppings of your choice",
      img: require("./../../assests/menu/Pastries/pastries-9.jpg"),
      category: "Pastries",
      ingredients: [
        { name: "Flour", quantity: 100, unit: "g" }, // 100 grams of flour
        { name: "Sugar", quantity: 20, unit: "g" }, // 20 grams of sugar
        { name: "Eggs", quantity: 2, unit: "pcs" }, // 2 eggs
        { name: "Butter", quantity: 30, unit: "g" }, // 30 grams of butter
        { name: "Milk", quantity: 100, unit: "ml" }, // 100 ml of milk
      ],
    },
  
    // Crepes
    {
      id: 35,
      price: 5000,
      title: "Sweet Crepe",
      desc: "Deliciously sweet crepe with sugar and toppings",
      img: require("./../../assests/menu/Crepes/crepes-1.jpg"),

      ingredients: [
        { name: "Flour", quantity: 50, unit: "g" }, // 50 grams of flour
        { name: "Eggs", quantity: 1, unit: "pc" }, // 1 egg
        { name: "Milk", quantity: 100, unit: "ml" }, // 100 ml of milk
        { name: "Sugar", quantity: 10, unit: "g" }, // 10 grams of sugar
      ],
    },
    {
      id: 36,
      price: 6000,
      title: "Chocolate Crepe",
      desc: "Crepe filled with rich chocolate",
      img: require("./../../assests/menu/Crepes/crepes-2.jpg"),

      ingredients: [
        { name: "Flour", quantity: 50, unit: "g" }, // 50 grams of flour
        { name: "Eggs", quantity: 1, unit: "pc" }, // 1 egg
        { name: "Milk", quantity: 100, unit: "ml" }, // 100 ml of milk
        { name: "Chocolate Powder", quantity: 20, unit: "g" }, // 20 grams of chocolate powder
      ],
    },
    {
      id: 37,
      price: 7000,
      title: "Nutella Crepe",
      desc: "Crepe filled with Nutella and other sweet toppings",
      img: require("./../../assests/menu/Crepes/crepes-3.jpg"),
      category: "Crepes",
      ingredients: [
        { name: "Flour", quantity: 50, unit: "g" }, // 50 grams of flour
        { name: "Eggs", quantity: 1, unit: "pc" }, // 1 egg
        { name: "Milk", quantity: 100, unit: "ml" }, // 100 ml of milk
        { name: "Nutella", quantity: 30, unit: "g" }, // 30 grams of Nutella
      ],
    },
    {
      id: 38,
      price: 6500,
      title: "Oreo Crepe",
      desc: "Crepe filled with crushed Oreos and cream",
      img: require("./../../assests/menu/Crepes/crepes-4.jpg"),
      category: "Crepes",
      ingredients: [
        { name: "Flour", quantity: 50, unit: "g" }, // 50 grams of flour
        { name: "Eggs", quantity: 1, unit: "pc" }, // 1 egg
        { name: "Milk", quantity: 100, unit: "ml" }, // 100 ml of milk
        { name: "Oreo", quantity: 3, unit: "pcs" }, // 3 Oreo cookies
        { name: "Whipped Cream", quantity: 20, unit: "g" }, // 20 grams of whipped cream
      ],
    },
    {
      id: 39,
      price: 5500,
      title: "Cheese Crepe",
      desc: "Savory crepe filled with melted cheese",
      img: require("./../../assests/menu/Crepes/crepes-5.jpg"),
      category: "Crepes",
      ingredients: [
        { name: "Flour", quantity: 50, unit: "g" }, // 50 grams of flour
        { name: "Eggs", quantity: 1, unit: "pc" }, // 1 egg
        { name: "Milk", quantity: 100, unit: "ml" }, // 100 ml of milk
        { name: "Cheese", quantity: 50, unit: "g" }, // 50 grams of cheese
      ],
    },
    {
      id: 40,
      price: 6000,
      title: "Tuna Crepe",
      desc: "Savory crepe filled with tuna and vegetables",
      img: require("./../../assests/menu/Crepes/crepes-6.jpg"),
      category: "Crepes",
      ingredients: [
        { name: "Flour", quantity: 50, unit: "g" }, // 50 grams of flour
        { name: "Eggs", quantity: 1, unit: "pc" }, // 1 egg
        { name: "Milk", quantity: 100, unit: "ml" }, // 100 ml of milk
        { name: "Tuna", quantity: 50, unit: "g" }, // 50 grams of tuna
        { name: "Vegetables", quantity: 30, unit: "g" }, // 30 grams of vegetables
      ],
    },
  
    // Extras
    {
      id: 41,
      price: 1500,
      title: "Half Liter Water",
      desc: "Refreshing half liter bottle of water",
      img: require("./../../assests/menu/Extras/extras-1.jpg"),
      category: "Extras",
      ingredients: [
        { name: "Mineral Water", quantity: 500, unit: "ml" }, // 500 ml of water

    {
      id: 42,
      price: 2500,

    {
